Secondary objective study include determine effect 7 day supplementation alanyl-glutamine glycine diarrhea frequency duration ; weight gain ; protein loss intestinal inflammation , lactoferrin excretion ; weight gain 2-4 week treatment . One hundred eight child meet inclusion criterion prospectively randomize one two treatment group : ( 1 ) Glycine ( 2 ) Alanyl-Glutamine . All child give vitamin A Zinc supplementation ; diarrhea , standard oral IV rehydration therapy administer .
